name: Andrew de Sena
bio: Andrew has been working for Build.com since 2012, specializing in Marketing. BossyUI is his way to stay connected and give back to CSU, Chico - his alma mater.

name: Carly Culver
bio: Carly is a Chico State Communication Design graduate with a foundation in Graphic Design. She is currently a User Experience Designer at Build.com and has played a longstanding role in the usability and visual design portions of the Bossy UI project.

name: Kevin Buffardi
bio: Kevin is a professor in the Computer Science department at California State University, Chico and is a co-founder of Chico Open Source Consortium. He has professional experience as a User Experience (UX) specialist and currently concentrates teaching and researching software testing.

name: Taber Fitzgerald
bio: Taber is a recent graduate who currently working at Build.com as a software developer. He has been with the BossyUi project since its inception as a student and gives back to the project as a mentor.
